commandFlagDescription: Open setup page(s) in the specified org. Running the command without flags will Open your current orgs Setup Home page in Lightning.
emailFlagDescription: Optional Path | Opens directly to Email Deliverability Settings
networkFlagDescription: Optional Path | Opens directly to Digital Experiences
deploymentFlagDescription: Optional Path | Supports Id | Opens directly to Deployment status.
profileFlagDescription: Optional Path | Supports Id | Opens directly to Profile List Views
idFlagDescription: Optional | if provided with a Path Flag that supports Id the specific record will be opened rather than the path home page.
classicDescription: Optional | if provided the page will open in Classic otherwise it opens in Lightning by default.
displayurlFlagDescription: Optional | If provided the url will be printed in the terminal.
urlonlyFlagDescription: Optional | If provided the page will not be opened in a browser it will just be printed in the terminal.
toManyFlagsEmailErrorFlag: The --email can not be used with the --network, --deployment, or --profile flags. Please try again.
toManyFlagsProfileErrorFlag: The --profile can not be used with the --email, --deployment, or --network flags. Please try again.
toManyFlagsDeployErrorFlag: The --deployment can not be used with the --email, --profile, or --network flags. Please try again.
toManyFlagsNetworkErrorFlag: The --network can not be used with the --email, --deployment, or --profile flags. Please try again.
idFlagUnsupportedErrorFlag: The provided path flag does not support ids
